Comment: The report is quite lengthy, and the blurb cited in the OP goes into no detail about it. The blurb vaguely references incidents of anti-Semitism but provides no quotes from the report or context (unless I'm only seeing part of it).  I don't doubt that there have been incidents of anti-Semitism on Harvard's campus. However, after the past couple years of pro-Israel voices declaring every criticism of Israel to be driven by anti-Semitism, I'm a bit skeptical that this blurb fairly summarizes the report.
